name: Score Quest v1.0.2
description:
Score Quest

Score Quest is an arcade-style game in which the player controls Moonman, keeper of keys, who is constantly falling through space. The player is tasked with navigating Moonman through pairs of platforms that have equally sized gaps placed at random. Collect keys and point packs to beat your high score. To add a fun twist to the game, the player may also upgrade their speed, point pack value, and key value.

Platform Compatibility

Computer Controls

To play the game on a computer, use WASD or the arrow keys to move.  Click to navigate the menu and to purchase upgrades.

Mobile Controls

To play the game on a mobile device, tap and hold the side of the screen you want the player to move. If you want the player to move right, tap and hold the right side of the screen. If you want the player to move left, tap and hold the left side of the screen. Tap to navigate the menu and to purchase upgrades.
